boardgame.name: East India Railway
Portobello Market
boardgame.description: London, 1901. At the world famous Portobello Market, the goal in the morning is to secure the best places to build stalls. Try to place your stalls in the most lucrative manner, cut off your opponents, and grab the most profitable alleys for yourself. You can build only where the Bobby stands_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;but a little cash will make the Bobby stand where you want him to!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;East India Railway was the prototype title for this game, and it became Portobello Market when published by Schmidt._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2007 Årets Spel Best Family Game Winner
2007 Vuoden Peli Adult Game of the Year Nominee
2008 Boardgames Australia Awards Best International Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgameversion: Schmidt Spiele multilingual edition with award logos

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: never used +++++ french/italian/german version. game components are completely language independent anyway and you can download english rules translations from boardgamegeek soon ++++++++++ will be shipped insured +++++ international payment : paypal OR direct bank to bank transfer (wich is cost-free inside european union by the way) OR cash (in a registered letter, exchanged into euros already) +++++ payment for germany : paypal OR personal pick up in berlin OR direct bank to bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! ++++++++++ international buyers beware : though german postal is relatively fast, they sadly aren´t cheap. it costs bewteen 19 - 37 euros for parcels up to a weight of 5 kg (= about 4 big boxed boardgames). price depends on where the package has to be shipped, so please ask for prices, before you hit the buy button ! +++++ insured shipment inside germany costs 8 euros

Playroom Entertainment (PLE86100) London, 1901... Shop keepers gather at the world-famous Portobello Market to set up stalls in the most lucrative places. Build your shops in the most profitable districts to draw in the wealthiest customers, and snatch the best lanes before your opponents. The Bobby determines where stalls can be built, but with a little effort, you can put the Bobby where you want! Will you make your fortune at Portobello Market?
Components bagged. Original insert. Played once, but I always hesitate to say like new. 3 lbs for shipping estimate
